notes: Interrupts the caster's channeling abilities upon cast.
The health regeneration bonus is provided by an aura, and lingers for 0.5 seconds.
Can regenerate up to 116 health within the area for the entire duration.
Using Verdurous Dale every time it is off cooldown is equivalent to having 2.9 health regeneration bonus per second.
abilities.description: Target the ground with a 350 radius. Provides +8 health regeneration to all allied units while they're in the area of effect.

name: Seeds of Serenity
description: An evergreen sprout treasured by the woodkin and highly coveted by interlopers and their like.
